characters.name: Sailor Moon
characters.description: Usagi Tsukino is the Sailor Guardian of love and justice, Sailor Moon. Originally from a prosperous civilization on the Moon known as the Moon Kingdom, she was reborn on Earth and re-awoke as the leader of the Sailor Senshi
characters.firstEpisode: The Crybaby: Usagi's Beautiful Transformation

characters.name: Tuxedo Mask
characters.description: Mamoru Chiba is the present-day incarnation of Prince Endymion and the civilian identity of Tuxedo Mask
characters.firstEpisode: The Crybaby: Usagi's Beautiful Transformation

characters.name: Sailor Mercury
characters.description: Ami Mizuno is one of the five original Inner Sailor Guardians of the Solar System and was the second Sailor Guardian introduced. Her Sailor Guardian identity is Sailor Mercury and her powers are based around water and ice, as well as intelligence and computers
characters.firstEpisode: Act 2 Ami - Sailor Mercury

characters.name: Sailor Venus
characters.description: Minako Aino is the civilian identity of Sailor V and the present-day incarnation of Sailor Venus, the guardian of love and beauty
characters.firstEpisode: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

characters.name: Sailor Mars
characters.description: Rei Hino is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Mars, the guardian of Flame and Passion
characters.firstEpisode: Act 3 Rei - Sailor Mars

characters.name: Sailor Jupiter
characters.description: Makoto is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Jupiter, the guardian of thunder and courage
characters.firstEpisode: Act 5 Makoto - Sailor Jupiter

characters.name: Sailor Saturn
characters.description: Hotaru Tomoe is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Saturn, the guardian of ruin and rebirth
characters.firstEpisode: Who is the True Messiah? Chaos of Light and Darkness

characters.name: Sailor Uranus
characters.description: Haruka Tenou is the civilian identity of Sailor Uranus, the guardian of the sky
characters.firstEpisode: Premonition of World's End? Mysterious New Senshi

characters.name: Sailor Neptune
characters.description: Michiru Kaiou is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Neptune, the guardian of the sea.
characters.firstEpisode: Premonition of World's End? Mysterious New Senshi

characters.name: Sailor Pluto
characters.description: Setsuna Meiou is the civilian identity and present-day incarnation of Sailor Pluto, the guardian of revolution
characters.firstEpisode: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

characters.name: Sailor Chibi Moon
characters.description: Chibiusa Tsukino is the crown princess of Earth in the 30th Century, the daughter of Neo-Queen Serenity and King Endymion and the civilian identity of Sailor Chibi Moon.
characters.firstEpisode: The Arrival of the Tiny Pretty Senshi

characters.name: Luna & Artemis
characters.description: Artemis and his partner Luna were advisors to Queen Serenity in the Silver Millennium, and when the kingdom was ruined, Serenity used the power of her Silver Crystal to send the two cats to Earth's future in order to awaken the Sailor Senshi.
characters.firstEpisode: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation & The Last Sailor Senshi! Sailor Venus Appears

characters.name: Ail
characters.description: Ail was an alien who came to Earth with An on the Makaiju. While living on Earth, he adopted the name of Seijuurou Ginga. To help An steal energy from humans, Ail would summon a Cardian by playing a melody on his flute.
characters.firstEpisode: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

characters.name: An
characters.description: An was an anime-only character, one of a pair of aliens who came to Earth on the Makaiju. She posed as a human, Natsumi Ginga, while she and her companion Ail attempted to steal energy from humans to restore the ailing Makaiju.
characters.firstEpisode: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

characters.name: Berthier
characters.description: Berthier was a member of the Black Moon Clan and the second youngest of the four Spectre Sisters. She accompanied Rubeus and her sisters to 20th-century Earth in order to locate Chibiusa and find the Silver Crystal
characters.firstEpisode: An Angel? A Devil? Mysterious Girl From the Sky

characters.name: Black Lady
characters.description: Black Lady is an evil, grown-up version of Chibiusa Tsukino, who was corrupted by Wiseman
characters.firstEpisode: The Birth of Black Lady, The Queen of Darkness

characters.name: Blue Saphir
characters.description: Saphir was a member of the Black Moon Clan and the younger brother of Prince Demande
characters.firstEpisode: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears

characters.name: Calaveras
characters.description: Calaveras was a member of the Black Moon Clan and the second oldest of the four Spectre Sisters. She accompanied Rubeus and her sisters to 20th-century Earth in order to locate Chibiusa and find the Silver Crystal
characters.firstEpisode: Women Should Be Strong and Beautiful! Rei's New Killer Move

characters.name: Rubeus
characters.description: Rubeus was a member of the Black Moon Clan. He led the Spectre Sisters to current-day Tokyo in search of Chibiusa

characters.name: Cyprine
characters.description: Ptilol and Cyprine were the fifth member of the Witches 5 to appear in Sailor Moon S. According to the Materials Collection, the two of them were one 'twin', but when they fought Ptilol would split away from Cyprine
characters.firstEpisode: Shadows of Destruction! The Awakening of the Messiah of Silence

characters.name: Diana
characters.description: Diana was a small gray kitten. She was the future daughter of Luna and Artemis, and served as Chibiusa's companion.
characters.firstEpisode: Artemis' Affair? A Mysterious Kitten Appears

characters.name: Eudial
characters.description: Eudial was the first member of the Witches 5 to appear in the Sailor Moon S season and Infinity arc. She showed tremendous expertise in computer programming and inventing weapons. Her powers were fire-based
characters.firstEpisode: The Arrival of the Tiny Pretty Senshi

characters.name: Fish's Eye
characters.description: Fisheye was a member of the Amazon Trio. He was originally a fish at the Dead Moon Circus, but was given human form.
characters.firstEpisode: Meeting of Fate! The Night Where a Pegasus Flies

characters.name: Esmeraude
characters.description: Esmeraude was a member of the Black Moon Clan who took Rubeus's place after he failed Prinde Demande
characters.firstEpisode: A UFO Appears! The Sailor Senshi are Abducted

characters.name: Hawk's Eye
characters.description: Hawk's Eye was a member of the Amazon Trio. He was originally a hawk at the Dead Moon Circus, but was given human form
characters.firstEpisode: Meeting of Fate! The Night Where a Pegasus Flies

characters.name: Helios
characters.description: Helios is the guardian of the Golden Crystal and the holy priest of Elysion
characters.firstEpisode: Meeting of Fate! The Night Where a Pegasus Flies

characters.name: Jadeite
characters.description: Jadeite was the first of Queen Beryl's Shitennou to appear in the series. He was handsome and used his charisma in his ploys to gather energy for the Dark Kingdom
characters.firstEpisode: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation

characters.name: Kaolinite
characters.description: Kaolinite was a member of the Death Busters. She was the first main enemy to appear from the Death Busters, and was soon shown to hold an important position in their organization
characters.firstEpisode: Premonition of World's End? Mysterious New Senshi

characters.name: Koan
characters.description: Koan was a member of the Black Moon Clan and the youngest of the four Spectre Sisters. She accompanied Rubeus and her sisters to 20th-century Earth in order to locate Chibiusa and find the Silver Crystal.
characters.firstEpisode: An Angel? A Devil? Mysterious Girl From the Sky

characters.name: Kunzite
characters.description: Kunzite is the 4th and most powerful general of the Shitennou
characters.firstEpisode: Romance Under the Moon! Usagi's First Kiss

characters.name: Pharoah 90
characters.description: Pharaoh 90 was the mastermind of the Death Busters. An enormous alien entity coming from the Tau Star System, it sought to take over the Earth through the power of the Silver Crystal
characters.firstEpisode: A Bright Shooting Star! Saturn and the Messiah

characters.name: Mimete
characters.description: Mimete was the second of the Witches 5 to appear. Her powers were charm-based and she has a rivalry with Minako Aino
characters.firstEpisode: Death of Uranus and Neptune? Talismans Appear

characters.name: Mistress 9
characters.description: Mistress 9 was an entity from the Tau Star System, implanted into Hotaru Tomoe by Germatoid after he made a bargain with Professor Souichi Tomoe.
characters.firstEpisode: Shadows of Destruction! The Awakening of the Messiah of Silence

characters.name: Naru Osaka
characters.description: Naru Osaka was the daughter of the owner of the Osa-P jewelry store and friend to Usagi Tsukino.
characters.firstEpisode: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation

characters.name: Petz
characters.description: Petz was a member of the Black Moon Clan and the oldest of the four Spectre Sisters. She accompanied Rubeus and her sisters to 20th-century Earth in order to locate Chibiusa and find the Silver Crystal
characters.firstEpisode: In Search of the Silver Crystal! Chibiusa's Secret

characters.name: Prince Demande
characters.description: Prince Demande was the head of the Black Moon Clan. He oversaw an attack on Crystal Tokyo in the 30th century.
characters.firstEpisode: Defeat Rubeus! The Final Battle in Space

characters.name: Professor Tomoe
characters.description: Professor Souichi Tomoe was the father of Hotaru Tomoe, owner of Mugen Academy, and a famous scientist. After an accident at his laboratory, he became the leader of the Death Busters
characters.firstEpisode: Premonition of World's End? Mysterious New Senshi,

characters.name: Ptilol
characters.description: Ptilol and Cyprine were the fifth member of the Witches 5 to appear in Sailor Moon S. According to the Materials Collection, the two of them were one twin, but when they fought Ptilol would split away from Cyprine
characters.firstEpisode: Shadows of Destruction! The Awakening of the Messiah of Silence

characters.name: Queen Beryl
characters.description: Queen Beryl was the commander of the Dark Kingdom and the first of many villains that would clash with the Sailor Senshi.
characters.firstEpisode: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation

characters.name: Queen Nehalennia
characters.description: Queen Nehelenia is the main villain of the 4th season of the anime series, and the leader of the Dead Moon Circus
characters.firstEpisode: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

characters.name: Sailor Aluminum Siren
characters.description: Sailor Aluminum Seiren was one of the Sailor Animamates subservient to Sailor Galaxia.
characters.firstEpisode: Enemies? Allies? Starlights and Sailor Senshi

characters.name: Sailor Ceres
characters.description: Sailor Ceres is one of the members of the Sailor Quartet.
characters.firstEpisode: Sailor Moon Eternal

characters.name: Sailor Chaos
characters.description: Sailor Chaos is one of Sailor Galaxia's forms. In this form, she is completely consumed by Chaos. Sailor Galaxia ended up being totally corrupted by Chaos
characters.firstEpisode: A Goodbye and an Encounter! The Destiny of Flowing Stars

characters.name: Sailor Cosmos
characters.description: Sailor Cosmos was a character who played an important part in the Stars arc of the Sailor Moon manga, where she was revealed to be the true form of Chibi Chibi
characters.firstEpisode: Usagi's Love! The Moonlight Lights up the Galaxy

characters.name: Sailor Galaxia
characters.description: Sailor Galaxia was an extremely powerful Sailor Senshi who known as the Soldier of Solitude and the Soldier of Destruction
characters.firstEpisode: A Goodbye and an Encounter! The Destiny of Flowing Stars

characters.name: Sailor Iron Mouse
characters.description: Sailor Iron Mouse was the first of the Sailor Animamates to appear
characters.firstEpisode: A Goodbye and an Encounter! The Destiny of Flowing Stars

characters.name: Sailor Juno
characters.description: Sailor Juno was a member of the Sailor Quartet
characters.firstEpisode: Sailor Moon Eternal

characters.name: Sailor Lead Crow
characters.description: Sailor Lead Crow was one of the Sailor Animamates subservient to Sailor Galaxia
characters.firstEpisode: Enemies? Allies? Starlights and Sailor Senshi

characters.name: Sailor Pallas
characters.description: Sailor Pallas was a member of the Sailor Quartet
characters.firstEpisode: Sailor Moon Eternal

characters.name: Sailor Star Fighter
characters.description: Seiya Kou is one of the members of the Three Lights idol group and is the civilian identity of Sailor Star Fighter. She is a student at Juban Public High School and the lead singer of the Three Lights.
characters.firstEpisode: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

characters.name: Sailor Star Healer
characters.description: Yaten Kou is one of the members of the Three Lights idol group and is the civilian identity of Sailor Star Healer
characters.firstEpisode: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

characters.name: Sailor Star Maker
characters.description: Taiki Kou is one of the members of the Three Lights idol group and is the civilian identity of Sailor Star Maker
characters.firstEpisode: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

characters.name: Sailor Tin Nyanko
characters.description: Sailor Tin Nyanko is the fourth and final Sailor Animamate. She has a cold personality, willing to kill anyone who is in her way. She is the only Sailor Animamate who is known to be a true Sailor Senshi.
characters.firstEpisode: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight

characters.name: Sailor Vesta
characters.description: Sailor Vesta was a member of the Sailor Quartet
characters.firstEpisode: Sailor Moon Eternal

characters.name: Tellu
characters.description: Tellu is the 3rd member of the Witches 5 and is the 3rd witch to collect Pure Heart Crystals and battle the Sailor Guardians.
characters.firstEpisode: Invasion From an Alternate Dimension! The Mystery of Mugen Academy

characters.name: Tiger's Eye
characters.description: Tiger's Eye was a member of the Amazon Trio. He was originally a tiger at the Dead Moon Circus, but was given human form.
characters.firstEpisode: Meeting of Fate! The Night Where a Pegasus Flies

characters.name: Gurio Umino
characters.description: Gurio Umino was the well-meaning but socially awkward otaku classmate of Usagi Tsukino and Naru Osaka.
characters.firstEpisode: Crybaby Usagi's Magnificent Transformation

characters.name: Viluy
characters.description: Viluy was the fourth member of the Witches 5. She had power over ice and also used technology and nano robots to attack her victims.
characters.firstEpisode: Believe in Love! Ami, a Kind Hearted Senshi

characters.name: Wiseman
characters.description: Wiseman was the advisor to the Black Moon Clan of Nemesis, and in that position led them into attacking Crystal Tokyo and then led them to 20th-century Tokyo after Chibiusa, all in pursuit of the Silver Crystal
characters.firstEpisode: An Angel? A Devil? Mysterious Girl From the Sky

characters.name: Zirconia
characters.description: Zirconia was the ringmaster of the Dead Moon Circus and commander of the Dead Moon forces prior to Queen Nehellenia's release from her mirror. She was always accompanied by the creature known as Zircon.
characters.firstEpisode: Meeting of Fate! The Night Where a Pegasus Flies

characters.name: Zoisite
characters.description: Zoisite was the third of the Shitennou to appear
characters.firstEpisode: A Powerful New Enemy! Nephrite's Evil Crest
